name: 2nd International Conference in the field of Climate Change
content: BioLeagues Worldwide warmly welcomes each one of the individuals and supporters from around the globe to attend the 2nd International Conference in the field of Climate Change Impact on highlighting the theme “Research Tools and Approaches to Improve Effective Responses to Climate Change” on 25th & 26th May 2021, at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The goal of ISERS is to gather scholars from all over the world to present advances in the methods and approaches towards climate change adaptation and disaster risk reduction and to foster an environment conducive to exchanging ideas and information
